akn:subsection.akn:heading: Subcommittee of National Geospatial Advisory Committee

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Subcommittee of National Geospatial Advisory Committee
(e) Funding For each of fiscal years 2021 through 2024, there is authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary $40,000,000 to carry out this section.
(f) Derivation of funds Funds to carry out the activities under this section shall be derived from amounts authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary that are enacted after January 5, 2021.
